TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrintTicket extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
Public NotInheritable Class PrintTicket Implements INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 定义打印作业的设置。

span.span: Defines the settings of a print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A对象是某种类型的调用的 XML 文档的简单-到-工作-与表示*PrintTicket 文档*。A object is an easy-to-work-with representation of a certain type of XML document called a *PrintTicket document*. 后者是一组指令告知如何设置其各种功能 （如分页和装订，双工技术） 的打印机。The latter is a set of instructions telling a printer how to set its various features (such as duplexing, collating, and stapling). 例如，若要指示打印机以打开其装订和装订左上角的打印作业，该文档应具有``指定的元素**StapleTopLeft**。For example, to instruct the printer to turn on its stapler and staple print jobs in the upper left corner, the document would have a `` element that specifies **StapleTopLeft**. 元素，反过来，由表示属性对象。The element is, in turn, represented by the property of the object. PrintTicket 文档必须符合[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)。The PrintTicket document must conform to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397). 类使你的应用程序配置打印机的功能而无需进行的任何直接编写 XML对象。The class enables your application to configure the printer's features without having to engage in any direct writing of XML objects. 家庭和企业的文件和照片打印机的最常用功能的所有由属性表示类。All of the most popular features of home and business file and photo printers are represented by properties of the class. 但是[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)定义多，通常，不功能和它可以进行扩展以便处理 specialty 打印设备的功能。But the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) defines many more, less common, features and it can be extended to handle features of specialty printing devices. 因此，尽管和类不能被继承，可以扩展[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)能够识别并不表示中的打印设备功能或类。So, although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. 有关详细信息请参阅[NOTINBUILD： 如何： 打印架构和创建新的打印系统类扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885)。For more information see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885). **请注意**时了采用 PrintTicket 文档的构造函数创建对象 (作为) 参数，该整个文档存储在该对象，包括它的 XML 元素中的非公共字段，小于不由任何的公共属性的常见功能快速类。**Note** When the object is created with the constructor that takes a PrintTicket document (as a ) parameter, that entire document is stored in a non-public field in the object, including the XML elements within it that express less common features that are not represented by any of the public properties of the class. 事实上，如果生成 PrintTicket 文档驱动程序正在使用的专用扩展[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)、 的私人定义标记也存储为非公共 PrintTicket 文档的一部分。In fact, if the driver that produced the PrintTicket document is using a private extension of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397), that privately defined markup is also stored as part of the non-public PrintTicket document. > [!CAUTION] > 类中命名空间不支持的 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中的使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试使用这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果你想要从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印，请参阅命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何确定特定打印机的功能以及如何配置打印作业以充分利用它们。The following example shows how to determine the capabilities of a specific printer and how to configure a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

[!code-csharp[PrintTicketManagment#UsingMergeAndValidate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintTicketManagment/CSharp/printticket.cs#usingmergeandvalidate)] [!code-vb[PrintTicketManagment#UsingMergeAndValidate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintTicketManagment/visualbasic/printticket.vb#usingmergeandvalidate)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream xmlStream) cil managed

param.name: xmlStream
param.span: 描述打印作业且符合打印架构的 XML 流。

span.span: An XML stream that describes a print job and conforms to the Print Schema.

summary.span: 使用符合 XML [打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 XML 流（其中包含 PrintTicket 文档）初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using an XML stream (that contains a PrintTicket document) that complies with the XML [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不流的读写位置重置回其原始位置。The constructor does not reset the read-write position of the stream back to its original position. 相应地，你应该重置它调用的构造函数后立即。Accordingly, you should reset it immediately after calling the constructor. 整个 PrintTicket 文档存储在中的对象，包括 express 不由任何的公共属性表示的不太常见功能的 XML 元素中的非公共字段类。The entire PrintTicket document is stored in a non-public field in the object, including the XML elements within it that express less common features that are not represented by any of the public properties of the class. 事实上，如果生成 PrintTicket 文档驱动程序正在使用的专用扩展[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)、 的私人定义标记也存储为非公共 PrintTicket 文档的一部分。In fact, if the driver that produced the PrintTicket document is using a private extension of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397), that privately defined markup is also stored as part of the non-public PrintTicket document. 的文档中，如果有的话，将不验证私有部分由构造函数中，但所有**打印架构**-定义的部分进行验证，包括未由任何的公共属性的部分类。The private parts of the document, if any, are not validated by the constructor, but all **Print Schema**-defined parts are validated, including the parts that are not represented by any of the public properties of the class. 相应地，可能即使所有的公共属性对应的 XML 标记无效时引发。Accordingly, the could be thrown even if all of the XML markup that corresponds to the public properties is valid. 当任何一个的属性时写入到，此非公共 PrintTicket 文档也会更改。When any of the properties of the are written to, this non-public PrintTicket document is changed as well. 它是返回的此非公共 PrintTicket 文档和方法。It is this non-public PrintTicket document that is returned by the and methods.

exception.span: 为无效 XML。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Collation As Nullable(Of Collation)
public: property Nullable<System::Printing::Collation> Collation { Nullable<System::Printing::Collation> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Printing::Collation> value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示打印机是否逐份打印其输出。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printer collates its output.

value.span: 表示打印机是否逐份打印其输出的 值。

span.span: A value indicating whether the printer collates its output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`DocumentCollate`关键字，不`JobCollateAllDocuments`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `DocumentCollate` keyword, not the `JobCollateAllDocuments` keyword. 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在测试打印机的功能时使用此属性和配置打印作业来充分利用它们。The following example shows how to use this property when testing a printer's capabilities and configuring a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property CopyCount As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: property Nullable<int> CopyCount { Nullable<int> get(); void set(Nullable<int> value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置打印作业的份数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of copies for the print job.

value.span: 一个可以为 null 的 值，指定要打印的份数。

span.span: A nullable value that specifies how many copies to print.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobCopiesAllDocuments`关键字，不`DocumentCopiesAllPages`关键字，或`PageCopies`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobCopiesAllDocuments` keyword, not the `DocumentCopiesAllPages` keyword, or the `PageCopies` keyword. 你可以对其进行测试对打印机的最大使用属性。You can test for the printer's maximum by using the property.

exception.span: 调用代码操作尝试将属性设置为小于 1 的值。

span.span: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value less than 1.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property DeviceFontSubstitution As Nullable(Of DeviceFontSubstitution)

public: property Nullable<System::Printing::DeviceFontSubstitution> DeviceFontSubstitution { Nullable<System::Printing::DeviceFontSubstitution> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Printing::DeviceFontSubstitution> value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示打印机是否用基于设备的字体替换打印作业上基于计算机的字体。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printer substitutes device-based fonts for computer-based fonts on the print job.

value.span: 一个 值，表示设备是否用基于设备的字体替换当前打印作业中基于计算机的字体。

span.span: A value indicating whether the device substitutes device-based fonts for computer-based fonts for the current print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageDeviceFontSubstitution`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageDeviceFontSubstitution` keyword. 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating what kind of two-sided printing, if any, the printer uses for the print job.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示打印机在执行打印作业时使用的双面打印类型（如果有）。

span.span: A value indicating what sort of two-sided printing, if any, the printer uses for the print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobDuplexAllDocumentsContiguously`关键字，不`DocumentDuplex`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobDuplexAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentDuplex` keyword. 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在合并两个的打印票证时使用此属性。The following example shows how to use this property while merging two print tickets. [!code-csharp[PrintTicketManagment#UsingMergeAndValidate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintTicketManagment/CSharp/printticket.cs#usingmergeandvalidate)] [!code-vb[PrintTicketManagment#UsingMergeAndValidate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintTicketManagment/visualbasic/printticket.vb#usingmergeandvalidate)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.MemoryStream GetXmlStream() cil managed

summary.span: 返回表示 属性值的 对象，作为符合[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 XML 流。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the property values of a as an XML stream that conforms to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

returns.span: 对象，它描述带有符合[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 XML 的打印票证。

span.span: A object that describes the print ticket with XML that conforms to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果任何属性是`null`，它们将只需不包含在 XML 标记。If any properties of the are `null`, they will simply not be included in the XML markup. 如果对象使用包含标记元素不表示任何 PrintTicket 文档构造类的公共属性，这些元素将包含在此方法返回 PrintTicket 文档。If the object was constructed with a PrintTicket document that contains markup elements not represented by any of the class's public properties, those elements will be included in the PrintTicket document returned by this method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property InputBin As Nullable(Of InputBin)
public: property Nullable<System::Printing::InputBin> InputBin { Nullable<System::Printing::InputBin> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Printing::InputBin> value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个表示要使用的送纸器（纸盒）的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating what input bin (paper tray) to use.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示要使用的送纸器以及是手动选择还是自动选择。

span.span: An value indicating what input tray is used and whether it is chosen manually or automatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 即，将有没有标记[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的功能`JobInputBin`， `DocumentInputBin`，或`PageInputBin`。That is, there will be no markup for the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s features `JobInputBin`, `DocumentInputBin`, or `PageInputBin`. 当此属性不是`null`，它将具有以下关系中定义的功能[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)。When this property is not `null`, it will have the following relationships to the features defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397). - 如果 XML 形式包含`JobInputBin`，则此属性的值与相同`JobInputBin`(无论是否还有`DocumentInputBin`或`PageInputBin`。If the XML form of the contains `JobInputBin`, then this property has the same value as `JobInputBin` (regardless of whether or not there is also `DocumentInputBin` or `PageInputBin`. 中的 XML 版本的标记)。markup in the XML version of the ). - 如果没有任何`JobInputBin`标记，但没有`DocumentInputBin`，则此属性的值与相同`DocumentInputBin`(无论是否还有`PageInputBin`标记) 存在。If there is no `JobInputBin` markup, but there is `DocumentInputBin`, then this property has the same value as `DocumentInputBin` (regardless of whether or not there is also `PageInputBin` markup) present. - 如果既无`JobInputBin`也不`DocumentInputBin`标记，但没有`PageInputBin`标记，则此属性具有相同的值`PageInputBin`。If there is neither `JobInputBin` nor `DocumentInputBin` markup, but there is `PageInputBin` markup, then this property has the same value as `PageInputBin`. 当此属性设置为任何值，然后匹配`JobInputBin`标记将添加到 XML 的打印票证和任何`DocumentInputBin`和`PageInputBin`将删除已存在的标记。When this property is set to any value, then matching `JobInputBin` markup will be added to the XML print ticket and any `DocumentInputBin` and `PageInputBin` markup that is already there will be removed. 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property PageBorderless As Nullable(Of PageBorderless)

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示设备是将内容打印到介质边缘，还是在边缘周围留出一些空白不打印。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the device prints content to the edge of the media or leaves an unprinted margin around the edge.

value.span: 指定打印机是否采用无边距打印的 值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether the printer uses borderless printing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageBorderless`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageBorderless` keyword. 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置打印机在执行打印作业时所用的纸张（或其他介质）的页面大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the page size for the paper (or other media) that a printer uses for a print job.

value.span: 一个 对象，使用名称、维度或二者兼之来表示页面大小。

span.span: A object that represents the page size by using a name, dimensions, or both.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageMediaSize`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageMediaSize` keyword. 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性来缩放以适合它是打印在纸张的边距可视元素。The following example shows how to use this property to scale a visual element to fit within the margins of the paper on which it is to print. span.span: A value specifying last-page-first printing or first-page-first printing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobPageOrder`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobPageOrder` keyword. 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置打印机在执行打印作业时所使用的页面分辨率等级。

span.span: Gets or sets the level of page resolution that the printer uses for a print job.

value.span: 用于表示定性值、每英寸点数值或二者兼之的分辨率的 值。

span.span: A value that represents the resolution as a qualitative value, a dots-per-inch value, or both.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类具有可以在其中指定 X 和 Y 维度的每英寸点数的属性和属性可以为提供分辨率定性表达式。The class has properties in which you can specify the dots-per-inch for the X and Y dimensions and a property where you can give a qualitative expression to the resolution. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageResolution`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageResolution` keyword. 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property PageScalingFactor As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: property Nullable<int> PageScalingFactor { Nullable<int> get(); void set(Nullable<int> value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置打印机放大或缩小页面上打印图像的百分率。

span.span: Gets or sets the percentage by which the printer enlarges or reduces the print image on a page.

value.span: 一个表示百分数的 值。

span.span: An value that represents a percentage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 打印机可以缩放的最大和最小限制。The printer can have maximum and minimum limits for scaling. 你可以使用测试规模限制。You can test for scale limits by using . A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 这属性通常表示**缩放**`ScoredProperty`的[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageScaling`关键字。This property generally represents the **Scale** `ScoredProperty` of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageScaling` keyword. 但有一些复杂性，如下所示。But there are some complexities as follows. 读取时属性，该属性的行为，如下所示。When reading the property, the property behaves as follows. - 如果 PrintTicket XML 文档具有`PageScaling`功能设置为**CustomSquare**选项，与**CustomSquare**选项的**缩放**值是正数值然后，是返回的值。If the PrintTicket XML document has the `PageScaling` feature set to the **CustomSquare** option, and the **CustomSquare** option’s **Scale** value is positive value, then that is the value that is returned. - 如果 PrintTicket XML 文档具有`PageScaling`功能设置为**自定义**选项，与**自定义**选项的**ScaleWidth**值是正值，就在那时，是返回的值。If the PrintTicket XML document has the `PageScaling` feature set to the **Custom** option, and the **Custom** option’s **ScaleWidth** value is positive value, then that is the value that is returned. - 在所有其他情况下，`null`返回。In all other cases, `null` is returned. 设置时属性，该属性的行为，如下所示。When setting the property, the property behaves as follows. - 如果设置为`null`，则`PageScaling`从 PrintTicket XML 文档中删除标记。If it’s set to `null`, then the `PageScaling` markup is removed from the PrintTicket XML document. - 否则为`PageScaling`PrintTicket XML 文档中的功能设置为**CustomSquare**和**CustomSquare**选项的**缩放**设置值与传递值。Otherwise, the `PageScaling` feature in the PrintTicket XML document is set to **CustomSquare** and the **CustomSquare** option’s **Scale** value is set to the passed value. (请参阅**异常**如果属性设置为小于 1 的值将发生什么情况。)(See **Exceptions** for what happens if the property is set to a value less than 1.)

exception.span: 调用代码操作尝试将属性设置为小于 1 的值。

span.span: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is less than 1.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property PagesPerSheet As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: property Nullable<int> PagesPerSheet { Nullable<int> get(); void set(Nullable<int> value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置打印在一张纸的每一打印面上的页数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of pages that print on each printed side of a sheet of paper.

value.span: 一个可以为 null 的 值，表示打印在一张纸的每个打印面上的页数。

span.span: A nullable value that represents the number of pages that print on each printed side of a sheet of paper.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数打印机仅支持有限的范围的特定的可能性，如 1、 2、 4、 6、 8 和一面。Most printers support only a limited range of specific possibilities, such as 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, and 16 pages per side. 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property. A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于**PagesPerSheet** `ScoredProperty`的[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously`关键字，不`DocumentNUp`关键字。This property corresponds to the **PagesPerSheet**`ScoredProperty` of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentNUp` keyword. 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

exception.span: 调用代码操作尝试将属性设置为小于 1 的值。

span.span: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is less than 1.

public: property Nullable<System::Printing::PagesPerSheetDirection> PagesPerSheetDirection { Nullable<System::Printing::PagesPerSheetDirection> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Printing::PagesPerSheetDirection> value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示打印机如何排列打印在一张纸的每一页面上的多页。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how a printer arranges multiple pages that print on each side of a sheet of paper.

value.span: 用于表示打印机如何在一张纸上呈现多页的 值。

span.span: A value indicating how a printer presents multiple pages per sheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，打印机可以呈现页中从左到右行与行堆积上到。For example, a printer can present pages in left-to-right rows with rows stacked top-to-bottom. A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于**PresentationDirection** subfeature 的[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously`关键字，不`DocumentNUp`关键字。This property corresponds to the **PresentationDirection** subfeature of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentNUp` keyword. 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

public: property Nullable<System::Printing::PhotoPrintingIntent> PhotoPrintingIntent { Nullable<System::Printing::PhotoPrintingIntent> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Printing::PhotoPrintingIntent> value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示打印机在打印照片时所使用的定性的质量级别。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating in qualitative terms the level of quality the printer uses to print a photograph.

value.span: 用于表示照片质量级别的 值。

span.span: A value indicating the level of photo quality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 照片打印机驱动程序定性将表达式转换在此属性为特定分辨率和其他因素的定量值。The photographic printer driver translates the qualitative expression in this property into specific quantitative values for resolution and other factors. A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PagePhotoPrintingIntent`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PagePhotoPrintingIntent` keyword. 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SaveTo(class System.IO.Stream outStream) cil managed

span.span: The that holds the saved .

summary.span: 通过使用符合[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 XML 格式将 设置保存到 对象。

span.span: Saves the settings to a object by using an XML format that conforms to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不流的读写位置重置回其原始位置。This method does not reset the read-write position of the stream back to its original position. 你应之后重置立即调用此方法。You should reset it immediately after calling this method. 如果任何属性是`null`，它们将只需不包含在 XML 标记。If any properties of the are `null`, they will simply not be included in the XML markup. 如果对象使用包含标记元素不表示任何 PrintTicket 文档构造类的公共属性，这些元素将包含在此方法由保存 PrintTicket 文档。If the object was constructed with a PrintTicket document that contains markup elements not represented by any of the class's public properties, those elements will be included in the PrintTicket document saved by this method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Stapling As Nullable(Of Stapling)
public: property Nullable<System::Printing::Stapling> Stapling { Nullable<System::Printing::Stapling> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Printing::Stapling> value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个表示打印机是否装订多页以及装订多页位置的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether, and where, a printer staples multiple pages.

value.span: 用于指定打印机如何装订输出的 值。

span.span: A value specifying how a printer staples the output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，打印机可以将两个日常用品放置一张纸或在左上角的一个装订的左边缘。For example, a printer can place two staples on the left edge of a sheet of paper, or one staple in the upper left corner. A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobStapleAllDocuments`关键字，不`DocumentStaple`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobStapleAllDocuments` keyword, not the `DocumentStaple` keyword. 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在测试打印机的功能时使用此属性和配置打印作业来充分利用它们。The following example shows how to use this property when testing a printer's capabilities and configuring a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property TrueTypeFontMode As Nullable(Of TrueTypeFontMode)
public: property Nullable<System::Printing::TrueTypeFontMode> TrueTypeFontMode { Nullable<System::Printing::TrueTypeFontMode> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Printing::TrueTypeFontMode> value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个表示打印机如何处理使用 TrueType 字体的文本的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how the printer handles text that uses TrueType fonts.

value.span: 用于指定打印机如何处理 TrueType 字体的 值。

span.span: A value specifying how a printer handles TrueType fonts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`null`此属性表示未指定此功能设置的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，当值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageTrueTypeFontMode`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageTrueTypeFontMode` keyword. 你可以测试打印机支持通过选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

exception.span: 调用代码操作尝试将属性设置为不在 枚举范围内的值。

span.span: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the enumeration.
